name: Final Apacolypse
description: You play as the last survivor of the human race and is also a cyborg. The earth had no more living potential so the human race had to move but they met a tragic end. As they past by a planet a bunch of robots attack them causing them to crash landing killing everyone except you. You are toweak to fight so you are protected by this bot... machinary... you and it is the only proof that the humans exist.
